name: v5.0.0.beta.8 - W.L. Weller
body:
## Added

- A `style` property has been added to our `package.json`, which makes for easy
  importing when using npm-sass, sass-module-importer and others.

## Changed

- The `triangle` mixin no longer has default argument values. The order of the
  arguments also changed: `$width` and `$height` now come before `$color`.

## Fixed

- The `bourbon update` CLI command now works when Bourbon is installed using a
  custom path.
- Fixed an issue that would cause Bourbon to not be found within Rails apps.

name: v4.3.4 - Maker’s Mark
body:
## Changed

- Updated deprecation warning message for `strip-units`. ([#1016])

[#1016]: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/1016

name: v4.3.3 - Denning’s Point
body:
### Fixed
- Internal Bourbon deprecation warnings for `is-size` and `is-length` will no
  longer be thrown when using the `size` mixin.

name: v4.3.2 - Elijah Craig
body:
## Fixed
- Internal Bourbon deprecation warnings for `unpack` and `is-length` will no
  longer be thrown when using the `position` mixin. ([#1004](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/1004))

name: v4.3.1 - Knob Creek
body:
## Fixed
- Internal Bourbon deprecation warnings will no longer be thrown. ([#1002](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/1002))

name: v4.3.0 - Buffalo Trace
body:
## Added
- Added deprecation warnings for features that will be removed in 5.0.0. Please
  reference our [change log](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md), which includes a list of these changes and
  removals. ([#891](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/891))

name: v5.0.0.beta.7
body:
# Added
- Added `white-space: nowrap;` to the `hide-visually` mixin so that content
  renders on one line and is correctly pronounced by screen readers. You can
  read more about this in Jesse Beach’s article “[Beware smushed off-screen
    accessible text](https://medium.com/@jessebeach/beware-smushed-off-screen-accessible-text-5952a4c2cbfe#.l4hkljiza).”

# Changed
- Removed the default values from the `$position` and `$coordinates` arguments
  for the `position` mixin.
- Updated `contrast-switch` to calculate contrast based on the WCAG 2.0
  specification. Please note that it is an approximation and we cannot guarantee
  full compliance, though all of our manual testing passed.
- Renamed the `$coordinates` argument in the `position` mixin
  to `$box-edge-values`.
- Updated `$font-stack-system` to include Avenir Next, Avenir, Lucida
  Grande, Helvetica, Noto, Franklin Gothic Medium, Century Gothic, and
  Liberation Sans. This follows [system-fonts](https://github.com/mrmrs/css-system-fonts) by Adam Morse.
- The `word-break` property was removed from the `word-wrap` mixin and
  is no longer output.
- Renamed the `word-wrap` mixin to `overflow-wrap` to align with the
  name change in the [CSS spec](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-text-3/#propdef-overflow-wrap).

### Added
- Added a `value-prefixer` mixin for generating vendor prefixes on values.

name: v4.2.7
body:
### Fixed
- Fixed a Sass deprecation warning when using the `background` and `background-image` mixins.

### Fixed
- Fixed a Sass load path issue that would intermittently break the importing of
  Bourbon in Rails apps.

### Changed
- Swapped the order of the `$file-formats` and `$asset-pipeline` arguments in
  the `font-face` mixin, so that `$asset-pipeline` is last (because it has a
  default and is likely used the least).

## Fixed
- We accidentally published 5.0.0.beta.3 as a stable release on npm, rather than a prerelease. We’ve unpublished that to go back to 4.2.6 on the stable channel.

## Added
- Added `pathname` requirement to resolve install issues.

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/compare/v5.0.0.beta.2...v5.0.0.beta.3)

### Added
- Added global settings for the `contrast-switch` mixin:
  `contrast-switch-dark-color` & `contrast-switch-light-color`.
- Added the `triangle` mixin back, but note that it’s been refactored and the
  arguments have changed.

### Changed
- Swapped argument names `contrast-switch`; what was `$dark-color` is now
  `$light-color` and what was `$light-color` is now `$dark-color`.

### Removed
- Dropped support for Ruby on Rails versions older than 4.2.
- Dropped support for LibSass versions older than 3.3.
- The `is-light` function is now private.

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/compare/v5.0.0.beta.1...v5.0.0.beta.2)

name: v5.0.0.beta.1
body:
### Added
- Added a `contrast-switch` mixin that switches between two colors based on the
  lightness of a another color. Great for building button styles.
- Added an `$all-text-inputs-invalid` variable to target the `:invalid`
  pseudo-class on all text-based inputs.
- The `ellipsis` mixin now takes a `$display` argument.
- Added a font stack for system fonts: `$font-stack-system`.
- Added a `hide-visually` mixin that hides an element visually while still
  allowing the content to be accessible to assistive technology,
  e.g. screen readers.
- The `font-face` mixin now allows additional CSS properties to be included in
  its block, which will output as part of the `@font-face` declaration.
  See [2356719](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/235671948ef3a9c343c4391d250082a0373c8d83).

### Changed
- The global default for the `modular-scale` ratio is now set to
  `$major-third` (`1.25`), instead of `$perfect-fourth` (`1.333`).
- All font stack variables are now prefixed with `$font-stack-`,
  e.g. `$font-stack-helvetica`.
- Global settings are now set via a `$bourbon` map, instead of variables.
  See [4e43c2d](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/4e43c2d7507999b539771bdc1b3733b18b3c1883).
- The `clearfix` mixin now uses `block` display, instead of `table`.

### Removed
- The `$weight` and `$style` arguments in the `font-face` mixin have been
  deprecated. Instead, you can now include these—along with other CSS
  properties—within the mixin block and they’ll be output as part of the
  `@font-face` declaration.

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/compare/da4451e...v5.0.0.beta.1)

name: v4.2.6
body:
## Fixed
- Fixed a bug with eyeglass support.

name: v4.2.5
body:
## Added

- Support for [eyeglass](http://eyeglass.rocks).

name: v5.0.0.alpha.0
body:
:warning: The changes mentioned below may not be complete, but should cover most of the deprecations and changes.

## New features
- A new `$global-font-file-formats` setting has been added, allowing you to globally set the font file formats you want the `font-face` mixin to use. The default is `ttf woff2 woff`.

## Improvements
- Removed the type selectors in `$all-text-inputs` and `$all-buttons` to reduce specificity.
- Font stack variables have been modernized.
- The `prefixer` mixin has been refactored and no-longer uses the `$global-prefixes` setting.

## Deprecations
- All vendor prefixing mixins have been removed. We recommend using a more robust and maintainable solution like [Autoprefixer](https://github.com/postcss/autoprefixer).
- The `em()` and `rem()` mixins have been deprecated.
- The `$monospace` font stack variable has been deprecated in favor of new `$consolas`, `$courier-new` and `$monaco` variables.
- The `triangle()` mixin has been deprecated.

## Maintenance
- The `strip-units` function is now `strip-unit`.
- The `size()` mixin now requires a comma-separated argument list: `@include size(1em, 2em);`.
- We restructured Bourbon’s directory tree to be more succinct and reduce possible conflicts. The full library now lives in a `core/` directory and all of the Sass partials are within a `bourbon/` directory to avoid polluting imports paths. _This will affect load paths if you use Bower_.

---

### Compatibility with Neat, Bitters & Refills

This alpha should be fully compatible with the latest version of Neat (`1.7.2`). Bitters `1.0` is not compatible, however the `master` branch is. We’ll get `1.1` out ASAP. At this time, most of Refills will not be compatible.

---

If you have comments or come across a bug, please [open an issue here on GitHub](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/issues/new).

name: v4.2.4
body:
## Improvements
- [`$all-text-inputs`](http://bourbon.io/docs/#text-inputs) now accounts for `input`’s that don’t have a `type` attribute specified, as they default to `type="text"`. (https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/8e7e36e01c47194d83951fb6315c5b26a008f2b7)

## Maintenance
- The [`bourbon`](https://npmjs.com/package/bourbon) npm package now has a proper load path. (https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/36c2d5576f1fe9dbdfd9543e15064c5a4a16343e)

name: v4.2.3
body:
## Bug fixes
- Fixed an issue with the `font-face` mixin outputting an extraneous commas when using LibSass set to compressed output

name: v4.2.2
body:
## Bug fixes
- The `flex-direction` mixin now properly outputs `box-direction` (old syntax) if set to `normal`.

name: v4.2.1
body: Restore `app` directory for npm

name: v4.2.0 - Woodford Reserve
body:
:tada: _Bourbon is now compatible with LibSass 3.1+!_

## Improvements
- [`$all-button-inputs`](http://bourbon.io/docs/#buttons-variable) is now simply `$all-buttons` (`$all-button-inputs` will continue to work until v5.0).
- `$all-buttons` also now includes the `button` element.
- [`$all-text-inputs`](http://bourbon.io/docs/#text-inputs) now includes the `textarea` element.

## Bug fixes
- [`selection`](http://bourbon.io/docs/#selection) is now compatible with LibSass and we fixed a bug which caused errors in certain versions of Ruby Sass.
- Fixed a bug with [`hide-text`](http://bourbon.io/docs/#hide-text) which caused some typefaces to extend into the visible area. It also no longer requires a `height`.

## Deprecations
- [`box-sizing`](http://bourbon.io/docs/#box-sizing) has been deprecated and will be removed in v5.0.

## Maintenance
- Bourbon now requires Sass 3.4.
- We are now [`bourbon`](https://npmjs.com/package/bourbon) on npm.
- We are now using [SCSS-Lint](https://github.com/causes/scss-lint) with [Hound](https://houndci.com) to help us keep our Sass in tip-top shape.
- We’ve begun porting our [documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs) over to [SassDoc](http://sassdoc.com), which will allow them to be versioned and make updating easier.
- We’ve updated our [browser support](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/#browser-support).

name: v3.2.4
body:
- Fixed [syntax bugs](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/582) in the flexbox and render-gradients mixins
- Fixed a [bug](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/issues/508) in the position mixin which caused LibSass to not ignore values

name: v4.1.1
body: - Fixes a [bug](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/617) in the `font-face` mixin which caused it to not output the correct asset paths when using the Rails asset pipeline and [sass-rails](https://github.com/rails/sass-rails)

- Added `hide-text` mixin
- Improved `radial-gradients` and `transition` mixins to be more vanilla and extensible
- Added `:disabled` styles to the `button` mixins
- Added support for changing position of `deprecated-linear-gradient`
- Removed deprecated `animation-basic` mixin
- Removed `position` Mixin

- Added `@font-face` mixin
- Added a `function-property-name()` function to enhance the `transition` mixins
- Added shorthand `position` mixin back due to user requests
- Minor Bug Fixes

- New command line tools (bourbon help, --help, -h, --version, -v, --force, --path)
- Added asset-pipeline support for `@font-face` mixin with `$asset-pipeline:true` argument
- New `hidpi-media-query` Mixin
- New `image-rendering` Mixin
- Fixed incorrect clearfix mixin for IE6/7

- Requires Sass 3.2+
- Removed the need to pass `-r ./stylesheets/sass/bourbon/lib/bourbon.rb` flag to the sass watch command.
- Removed the `compact()` ruby function. Bourbon is now an all sass library and platform agnostic!!
- `Compact()` function rewritten in SASS. Thanks to @nottrobin for helping nail this down.
- Refactored `prefixer` mixin to be more succinct.
- New `$all-text-inputs-hover` variable for targeting the :hover pseudo-class of `$all-text-inputs`
- New `$all-text-inputs-focus` variable for targeting the :focus pseudo-class of `$all-text-inputs`
- New mixins:  `perspective()` and `perspective-origin()`
- Updated mixins to use variable arguments supported in sass 3.2.

##### Deprecation warning — must read!
- Some Border-radius mixins have been deprecated. These include:
  - `border-radius()`
  - `border-top-left-radius()`
  - `border-top-right-radius()`
  - `border-bottom-left-radius()`
  - `border-bottom-right-radius()`
- See the [border-radius docs](http://bourbon.io/docs/#border-radius) for a list of border-radius mixins that have **NOT** been deprecated.

- Refactored the compact() function to use sass's variable-arguments feature.
- Removed unused variables from the radial-gradient function.

- Added new [retina-image addon](http://bourbon.io/docs/#retina-image)
- Added new [keyframes mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#keyframes)
- Added new [Pixel to Ems addon](http://bourbon.io/docs/#px-to-em)
- Added new [placeholder mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#placeholder)
- Added new [size addon](http://bourbon.io/docs/#size)
- Added new [triangle addon](http://bourbon.io/docs/#triangle)
- Added new [vendor prefix settings](http://bourbon.io/docs/#prefixer-settings)
- Added the stylesheets path to Sass' load_paths. This allows non Rails apps to use the assets bundled with the gem directly, instead of copying them manually into each projects, and manually updating them.

#### Deprecation warning — must read!

The `box-shadow()` mixin has been deprecated.

name: v3.1.1
body:
- Added new [transform-style mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#transform)
- Fixed bug with [retina-image addon](http://bourbon.io/docs/#retina-image) to load correct 1x asset-pipeline image.
- Fixed bug with [hide-text addon](http://bourbon.io/docs/#hide-text)
- Removed deprecated [box-shadow mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#box-shadow) from the [button addon](http://bourbon.io/docs/#buttons).

name: v3.1.2.1
body:
- Updated radial-gradient [mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#radial-gradient) and [function](http://bourbon.io/docs/#radial-gradient-function) to output new spec.
- Updated linear-gradient [mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#linear-gradient) and [function](http://bourbon.io/docs/#linear-gradient-function) to output new spec.
- Removed `moz, ms, o` vendor-prefixes from the `linear-gradient()` and `radial-gradient()` mixins and function.
- Updated [background-image](http://bourbon.io/docs/#background-image) and [background shorthand](http://bourbon.io/docs/#background) mixins to output new gradient specs.
- Added new [backface-visibility mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#backface-visibility)
- Removed unneeded vendor prefixes from [transition](http://bourbon.io/docs/#transitions) and [perspective](http://bourbon.io/docs/#perspective) mixins.
- Removed unnecessary `ms` vendor prefix from [keyframes mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#keyframes)
- Fixed bug in the prefixer mixin that was throwing unnecessary warnings. [issue 205](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/issues/205)
- Added [placeholder](http://bourbon.io/docs/#placeholder) support for Firefox 19+

name: v3.1.3
body: - Fixed bug with backwards compatibility of the older `linear-gradient()` syntax—specifically `side-and-corner` support.

name: v3.1.4
body: - `border-image()` mixin now plays nicely with the new `linear-gradient()` mixin changes.

name: v4.1.0
body:
- Added Bourbon’s version number to the main manifest partial (`_bourbon.scss`) for easy reference
- Added a `text-decoration` mixin
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#text-decoration)
- Added a `selection` mixin
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#selection)
- Fixed a bug in the `background` mixin when only passing a color
- Fixed a bug in the `hide-text` mixin for non-English characters
- Fixed `ellipsis` mixin to included `word-wrap` for IE8/9
- Fixed a bug in the Flexbox mixin to output `-ms-flex-pack: distribute;` instead of `-ms-flex-pack: center;`
- Flat style for the `button` add-on now accepts `$padding` and `$text-size` arguments
- The `font-face` mixin now let’s you specify file formats, plus has WOFF2 support
- The `modular-scale` function now let’s you set defaults
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#modular-scale)
- The `hide-text` add-on now accepts a `height` argument
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#hide-text)
- The `position` mixin now supports the `calc()` CSS function
- The `size` mixin now supports `auto`, `inherit`, `initial` values, unitless numbers, intrinsic sizing values and the `calc()` CSS function
- The `word-wrap` mixin can now be reset to `normal`
- Removed our `prefixer` function from `border-radius` shorthand mixin
- Deprecated the `button` mixin
  - [Bitters](http://bitters.bourbon.io) now takes care of that
- Deprecated the grid functions (`flex-grid`, `flex-gutter`, `grid-width`), which were moved to [Neat](https://github.com/thoughtbot/neat)
- Deprecated the `golden-ratio` function (use the `modular-scale` function instead)

### Bower Users:

We changed where Bower looks for Bourbon’s files. Instead of a `dist` directory, which was just a duplicate of the entire Bourbon library for Bower to use, we now point Bower to `app/assets/stylesheets`. **You’ll need to update your `bower.json` manifest file to reflect this change.**

name: v4.1.0.pre
body:
- Added the version number to the main manifest partial (`_bourbon.scss`) for easy reference
- Added a `text-decoration` mixin
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#text-decoration)
- Added a `selection` mixin
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#selection)
- Fixed a bug in the `background` mixin when only passing a color
- Fixed a bug in the `hide-text` mixin for non-English characters
- Fixed `ellipsis` mixin to included `word-wrap` for IE8/9
- Fixed a bug in the Flexbox mixin to output `-ms-flex-pack: distribute;` instead of `-ms-flex-pack: center;`
- Flat style for the `button` add-on now accepts `$padding` and `$text-size` arguments
- The `font-face` mixin now let’s you specify file formats
- The `modular-scale` function now let’s you set defaults
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#modular-scale)
- The `hide-text` add-on now accepts a `height` argument
- Removed our `prefixer` function from `border-radius` shorthand mixin
- Removed the `dist` directory, which was a duplicate of the library for Bower (Bower now points to `app/assets/stylesheets`)
- Deprecated the `button` mixin
- Deprecated the grid functions (`flex-grid`, `flex-gutter`, `grid-width`), which were moved to [Neat](https://github.com/thoughtbot/neat)
- Deprecated the `golden-ratio` function (use the `modular-scale` function instead)

name: v4.0.2
body:
- Added a global setting for Rails’ Asset Pipeline
  - [Documentation](http://bourbon.io/docs/#asset-pipeline)
- Fixed a bug with the `size` mixin not outputting `width`

name: v3.2.1
body:
Fixed a bug that prevented `@font-feature-settings` mixin from being imported.

Fixed a bug that prevented the `@triangle` mixin from compiling properly with Sass 3.2 and Libsass

name: v4.0.1
body: Fixed a bug that prevented `@font-feature-settings` mixin from being imported.

name: v3.2.0 - sass-rails / libsass
body:
Official release for use with Sass 3.2.x.

:warning: If you are using **libsass** or **sass-rails** use **v3.2.x**.

Bourbon 3.2.0 contains all the new features found in 4.0.0, except for features that break backwards compatibility. Read the [v4.0.0-RC.1 backwards incompatibility section](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/releases/tag/v4.0.0-rc.1).

For a full list of features and changes, see the [4.0.0-RC.1](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/releases/tag/v4.0.0-rc.1) and the [4.0.0-RC.2](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/releases/tag/v4.0.0-rc.2) changelogs.

**Install**

```
gem install bourbon -v 3.2.0
```

**Gemfile**

```
gem 'bourbon', '~> 3.2.0'
```

name: v4.0.0 stable
body:
Official stable release for use with Sass 3.3.x

:warning: If you are using **libsass** or **sass-rails** use **v3.2.x**.

For a full list of features and changes, see the [4.0.0-RC.1](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/releases/tag/v4.0.0-rc.1) and the [4.0.0-RC.2](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/releases/tag/v4.0.0-rc.2) changelogs.

**Install**

```
gem install bourbon -v 4.0.0
```

**Gemfile**

```
gem 'bourbon', '~> 4.0.0'
```

name: v4.0.0-RC.2
body:
**New Features**
- New `rem(*arg)` function for pixel-to-rem conversion: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/43faa8da5e6d267b4da5ce45ff812af3c59f48ff
- New `@word-wrap(*arg)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/0e752d908602b3c12c27490e3b21c4dfaa7a2e07

**Bug Fixes**
- Fixed bug in `@directional-property` mixin that prevented it from working properly. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/ba3f299226ca77f97531e8501b4a1da9dbd33924
- Fixed bugs with variable scope in color-lightness function: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/a11567c9168aea42f2a3c6465a435ef0572c14c4
- Fixed bug that prevents backwards compatibility in `@triangle` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/089beb5a103004f07eddcfe0d8c20e059f02fe8d

name: v4.0.0-RC.1
body:
### Notes
- Abiding by semver, I bumped the version number to 4.0 becuase backwards compatibility broke in certain places. Read the section on backwards compatibility below.
- The docs will be updated soon.
- Please report any issues you run into. Especially with `@include background-image (..)` or `@include background (..)`, which was [completely rewritten](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/293).

### Changelog

#### New Features

##### Mixins
- New Flexbox mixins for 2012 spec: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/e2c617c9f6f4b8a0350cc1480f345445fc7e4f0b
- New `@filter (..)` mixin to support CSS3 filters: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/5b1c6fb5712ab99cf11ae2313e2721dfd68742e0
- New `@ellipsis(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/6e6000a01516fbac02b95ed9e01a9b5d7296c116
- New `@calc(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/92790008b2c9b3c1f4b93a5d1e877a85753c7fce
- New `@border-width(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/07bcd69f0bf89040d273c26a21a3f13f8a3cd3e6
- New `@border-color(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/07bcd69f0bf89040d273c26a21a3f13f8a3cd3e6
- New `@border-style(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/07bcd69f0bf89040d273c26a21a3f13f8a3cd3e6
- New `@padding(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/07bcd69f0bf89040d273c26a21a3f13f8a3cd3e6
- New `@margin(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/07bcd69f0bf89040d273c26a21a3f13f8a3cd3e6
- New `@directional-property(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/07bcd69f0bf89040d273c26a21a3f13f8a3cd3e6
- New `@font-feature-settings` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/011bde6e75e06e0207c46750144b11f3cddffe54
- New `@hyphens (..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/8287d38dec277bc92e630020c36d78391d149e03

##### Functions
- New `unpack(..)` function: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/dfba4b396af33dd73444fc5b822dd84e97a7a20e
- New `strip-units(..)` function: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/4aaf53e0b44d90f62b8163f4c1092853957639f9

##### Variables
- New global prefixer variables for project-wide control over vendor prefixes. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/331c5f71ce8648e22de2c688025750e839c9d7ea
- New global variable—`$em-base`—to the `em(..)` function. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/331c5f71ce8648e22de2c688025750e839c9d7ea
- New scaling-variables to use with the [modular-scale mixin](http://bourbon.io/docs/#modular-scale). https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/5bdaa07c0fcfa6f1e3507185fa805741eeb33952)
- New variables for control of button input types: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/58b4c14df4f5ec42e5c94508d59064137aac5788

``` scss
#{$all-button-inputs}
#{$all-button-inputs-hover}
#{$all-button-inputs-focus}
#{$all-button-inputs-active}
```

#### Changes to existing mixins, function, etc.
- New `flat` button style for `@button(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/4fb47e96be01b68588a522baf74b7d13033b8852
- Improvements to the `@button(..)` mixin to accept additional `$text-size` and `$padding` arguments. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/9014bb204e2fad0c739fab4b8d185ec0b280720f
- Added finer control over the `$size` and `$color` of the `@triangle` mixin to accept a 2-value list. 
  https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/27b2db9e9d3977380b6281a79535567cfb830073
- Added double-stranded support to the `modular-scale(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/eb883dd2d454b15a58afa92dd23338d8897d98b1
- Added additional direction styles to the `@triangle` mixin. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/daf825d345914dfbc532fb26d8fc1e1087f0676a

``` scss
inset-up, inset-down, inset-left, inset-right.
```

#### Under the hood improvements
- Added `:focus` selector to the `@button(..)` mixin to improve accessibility. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/b8ac40d7349eb10a5b4c5a424103495b36329da1
- Improved the box-shadows generated by the `@button(..)` mixin.
- New and improved lightness function in the `@button(..)` mixin.  [More info](http://robots.thoughtbot.com/closer-look-color-lightness)
  https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/c8815a637ccdeefb9b1e26950d174e6f7934d065
  https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/c0cc8ebbb3dac59cc7aaaa1a01670e113e58f573
- Removed hard-coded `font-size` in the `@button(..)` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/3159147694cee1e876fbd6a5f129d10658006eb9
- Improved the `transition(..)` mixin to now prefix the `transform` keyword with vendor prefixes.

``` scss
@include transition(transform 1s ease, .. );
```
- Improvements to the `@keyframes` mixin to output vendor-prefixed declarations for spec keyframes rule. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/4a5cd13aab2cf1651509332198c400da612ebfa1
- Improvements to the `@placeholder` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/c218d4f1131256af01c4026de9ea37d9167e8727
- Improvements to `$all-text-inputs` and `$all-button-inputs` variables: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/56f1375eee5c0d7a6bb3f23d01066f5ac71a8072
  https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/8e19574690316138681e1ab449593f4868c5c414
- Improved `@hide-text` mixin: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/5ef5caff5d6edd0392b7776e839c94ad1f606f1d
- Updated `@image-rendering (..)` mixin to latest spec: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/ec9d362f7e687fc3df31cace5f46dce6d12640ee
  https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/86e8ac88f86dee140f030350d13f0625fc01af9c
- Improved `$helvetica` font-stack for better Android support: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/e9b4a2d149657560dd0d85ee37bcb8b0768618c5
- Added IE10 support for flexbox: https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/c986a722ea64b3afd54a76603a964e1d1b15b4ed
- Removed opera prefix from the `@keyframes` mixin. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/9dfe80ca3dc83a615bbe4d2e9434b4eb21edb98a
- Fixed transition mixin defaults to work with Firefox 22+ https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/0aadc560548ab5176d744a38217bb8463f211cb1
- Updated the [clearfix mixin](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/7ff5ebfda1fef6238411065f193abbdadaea6e0b).
- Repository updated to support [Bower](http://bower.io/)

#### Backward incompatibility warning
- Changed [retina-image suffix](http://bourbon.io/docs/#retina-image) from `@2x` to `_2x`. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/16afd8d7cfa135ba6f7c31300b7da560129b99da 
- Changes to `size(..)` mixin to not accept unitless values.
- Changed the `position(..)` mixin to use `null` values instead of unitless `0` values. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/49c93793285d409b488b0303dc8a8d23a16296bb
- Deprecated the `@inline-block` mixin.
- Removed the deprecated `box-shadow(..)` and `background-size(..)` mixins for good. https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/b1dbeea23dbd2e21ec0e42ebd599611c9ebba561
- Entirely rewritten `background(..)`, `background-image(..)`, and `border-image(..)` mixins to fix a bug that broke valid css `linear/radial-gradient` syntax. Note, make sure your linear and radial-gradients are written to the latest spec. The old syntax may break the mixins. [More Info](https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/pull/293). https://github.com/thoughtbot/bourbon/commit/0249edd0cfe92b848f7fbca881d68dc326269f05

``` scss
// New Syntax
@include background-image( radial-gradient( circle at 50% 50%, orange, red ) );
// Old Syntax
@include background-image( radial-gradient( 50% 50%, cover circle, orange, red ) );
```

name: v3.2.0-beta.2
body:
**Released on Jan 9th, 2014**

Stable version is coming soon.
